116) have missions have a special set of mechjeb commands that will basically do the mission for you.

117) rcs is not powerful enouhg

118) why did remove launch tower?

119) there should be a super RTG that produces all the electricity of a solar panel but doesnt need light

120) there should be an srb with 2000 thurst.

Grammar and spelling done so purposefully.

This thread is all about the worst-case scenario of the future of the KSP community, people would be asking these questions seriously, and are already beginning to do so. (I shudder every time)

I hope it never actually gets this bad. I really do.
